event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{Passing argument {0} to function {1} and then casting the return value to {2} is suspicious.}{{code{8UL /* sizeof (struct bigger_than_ptr *) */}}}{{code{malloc}}}{{code{struct bigger_than_ptr *}}}}}}
{CovLStrv2{{t{Did you intend to use {0} instead of {1}?}{{code{sizeof (struct bigger_than_ptr)}}}{{code{sizeof (struct bigger_than_ptr *)}}}}}}

typePropertiesGroup.localEffect: The wrong sizeof value is used in an expression or as argument to a function. The result is an incorrect value that may cause unexpected program behaviors.
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: The sizeof operator is invoked on the wrong argument

event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{Passing argument {0} to function {1} and then casting the return value to {2} is suspicious.}{{code{8UL /* sizeof (struct bigger_than_ptr *) */}}}{{code{malloc}}}{{code{struct bigger_than_ptr *}}}}}}
{CovLStrv2{{t{Did you intend to use {0} instead of {1}?}{{code{sizeof (struct bigger_than_ptr)}}}{{code{sizeof (struct bigger_than_ptr *)}}}}}}

typePropertiesGroup.localEffect: The wrong sizeof value is used in an expression or as argument to a function. The result is an incorrect value that may cause unexpected program behaviors.
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: The sizeof operator is invoked on the wrong argument
